definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
central business district (e.g. CBD of Beijing)

sentences.english: There is a Sunken Garden in the central area of the park.
sentences.chinese: 奧運公園的中心區有一個下沉花園廣場。

sentences.english: Yingze District of Taiyuan City is the center of cultural, social and cultural wealth of resources.
sentences.chinese: 迎澤區是太原市的文化中心區，社會文化資源豐富。

sentences.english: Note the dark red congested regions that represent accumulation of RBC's in centrilobular regions.
sentences.chinese: 暗紅色淤血區表示肝小葉中心區的紅細胞積聚。

sentences.english: Office Building of Century Group is situated at the junction of Xingang Road and the 3rd Street downtown Tanggu.
sentences.chinese: 世紀集團辦公樓地處塘沽中心區新港路與三號路交口。

sentences.english: ZECY:There is a new free-standing cafe near the downtown.
sentences.chinese: 在市中心區附近有座新的獨立咖啡館。

sentences.english: The brigade arrived voluntarily at a center set up to integrate militia fighters into the national army, Ironside told CNN.
sentences.chinese: 他們主動來到一個專門爲民兵同國民軍混合的中心區。

sentences.english: Changning District is located in the west of downtown Shanghai and covers an area of 38 square km.
sentences.chinese: 長寧區位於上海市中心區西部，面積38平方公里。

sentences.english: The Parkview Green is a unique urban experience in the heart of the CBD in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 芳草地項目打造了北京CBD中心區獨特的城市體驗。

sentences.english: The police quelled the disturbances in inner-city areas.
sentences.chinese: 警察平息了市中心區的騷亂。

sentences.english: Tudor Court represents your opportunity to locate at the heart of the new Birmingham.
sentences.chinese: 都鐸宛，您在新伯明翰中心區置業的好機會。

sentences.english: This development has opened up opportunities for other centres.
sentences.chinese: 其它的中心區就有了機會。

sentences.english: A static central hub, which is 22m (72ft) across, will contain the reception area.
sentences.chinese: 靜態的中心區直徑22米，將包括接待區。

sentences.english: Merlin streets in the Futian District, northern, central area known as the garden.
sentences.chinese: 梅林街道位於福田區的北面，有中心區後花園之稱。

sentences.english: The three overpasses and the Olympic Central District will be lit up by the newly installed lights.
sentences.chinese: 這三座高架橋和奧運中心區將被新安裝的景觀燈照亮。

sentences.english: In February, a bank employee committed suicide by leaping from a building in Hong Kong's Central district.
sentences.chinese: 在二月，一名銀行職員從香港中心區的高樓跳樓自殺。

sentences.english: The location of VIL heartland is orientated by its barycenter.
sentences.chinese: 採用權重定位法對VIL中心區進行定位。

definition: Nanhai district of Foshan city 佛山市[Fo2 shan1 shi4], Guangdong
